description:
Join Akay Bioactives in the development of natural and science-based products that revolutionize health!

Akay Bioactives, a proud brand of the Oterra Group, is a supplier of natural ingredients that primarily service the dietary supplement industry. We stand out with 4 international manufacturing facilities, 2 R&D labs, over 50 ingredients, and an impressive 70+ published clinical studies. We are a small but exceptionally ambitious and globally diverse team, leading the charge as pioneers in natural and clinically substantiated bioactive ingredients.

Our driving force? To amplify nature's innate capacity to enhance human health. We achieve this by sustainably transforming natural resources into bioactives with proven health benefits for consumers. Our unparalleled clinical research and cutting-edge delivery technologies enable us to unlock the full potential of nature's hidden abilities.

With a vertically integrated approach and an agile partnership model, we empower our collaborators to accelerate and enhance innovation. Together, we support in-demand claims, improve health outcomes, and shape new consumer trends. Join us in shaping the future of health and wellness.

Meet your new team!

We are looking for a talented Sales Manager to join our growing team. This is a remote position based on the East Coast, United States. You’ll join a dedicated team that drives aggressive company-wide growth by providing technical expertise and ensuring a strong customer presence. We focus on developing collaborative partnerships and leveraging our diverse ingredient portfolio to drive new product co-development with our customers and capture market share within the region.

What would you role look like?

As the Sales Manager, you'll embody a motivated, self-starting and entrepreneurial spirit. This hunter role demands a focus on proactive prospecting and adept scheduling of both in-person and virtual meetings to foster new business opportunities. Your primary customers would be multi-channel dietary supplement brands and contract manufacturers. Expect to embrace a dynamic environment, with travel comprising up to 50% of your time, ensuring an exciting blend of face-to-face interactions and virtual engagement in achieving our goals.

Duties and responsibilities:
• Serve as technical subject matter expert for Akay Bioactives Ingredient portfolio and technologies to drive sales within the designated region.
• Drive profitable growth through proactive prospecting and sales pipeline management, achieving regional sales targets via in-person and virtual meetings with new and existing customers
• Use a broad range of market research methods, analytical tools, and databases to uncover and qualify potential customers.
• Partner with fellow commercial organization partners (sales, marketing, product management) and internal stakeholders (R&D, Quality) to maximize the customer experience.
• Efficiently manage and report sales objectives, KPIs, and CRM data.
• Deliver financial reports and updated sales pipeline to management for informed decision-making.
• Identify new business opportunities and market shifts, providing strategic input for product strategy and positioning.
• Engage in trade shows and industry events to generate leads and gather market insights.

Who are we looking for?

The ideal candidate for this role is someone with a strong background in sales, particularly in the health and nutrition industry, who is comfortable engaging with various stakeholders including PhDs, R&D professionals, product developers, and purchasing managers. They should possess exceptional skills in proactive prospecting and sales pipeline management. This individual should also thrive in a dynamic environment, where they can demonstrate their entrepreneurial spirit.

Experience and Skills Required:
• Bachelor’s degree in business, nutrition, life sciences or related majors
• 2+ years of experience in technical sales and/or marketing in the nutraceutical industry
• Ability to effectively communicate and influence internal and external audiences, using both oral and written communication skills.
• Knowledge of the dietary supplement markets
• Capacity to work independently and be a self-starter
• Driven to achieve on revenue goals and strategic company and personal objectives
• Required travel as needed up to 50%

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience in selling botanical extracts and/or nutraceutical ingredients to diverse channels in the dietary supplement industry including natural & specialty, mass market, practitioner, MLM and contract manufactures.
• Experience using Salesforce or other CRM software and a formalized sales process.
• Clear written and oral communication skills; ability to effectively understand and articulate science based products with customer key stakeholders.

What can we offer?

We can offer an exciting opportunity in an ambitious organization, where commitment is strong, and where we work with the purpose of improving our processes and results. We have an informal tone, and put a high value on teamwork, working together, and transparency.
• Competitive salary with performance-based bonus plans
• 401K Matching
• Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance
• Health Savings Account / Flex Spending Account
• Paid Holidays, Vacation, Parental Leave
• Flexible remote work environment

Further information and application

We would love to know more about you and your motivation for this job! Please send us a CV in English, latest 60 days from day of posting. If you have any questions regarding the position, please contact hiring manager Justin at justin.smith@akaybioactives.com

Please note that we will be working with a continuous selection process, which means that we may close the application process earlier than stated if we find the right candidates. So, don’t delay, please send us your application today.

Start: As soon as possible, with regards of the notice period
